item.title: GOP Lawmakers Slam Those Who Got Paid During Shutdown
item.description: With the record-breaking shutdown set to end, Republican lawmakers are angry that bills to withhold congressional pay during a shutdown failed to pass...

item.title: Senate Votes to End Nation's Longest Govt Shutdown
item.description: The Senate on Monday voted to pass the new bipartisan continuing resolution to end the 41-day shutdown and reopen the government.

item.title: DeSantis Ally Announces Gubernatorial Run
item.description: James Fishback, a supporter of Gov. Ron DeSantis, is running for governor of Florida.

item.title: Senate Nears Passage of Bill to Reopen Govt; House Next
item.description: The Senate began its final votes Monday evening on legislation to reopen the government, bringing the longest shutdown in history closer to an end aft...

item.title: House Dems Rebel, Prod Schumer to Resign After Shutdown Deal
item.description: A growing number of House Democrats and liberal groups are asking Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer to resign after a group of his senators teamed ...
